name: Three Feet Apart
description:
Two married young men decide to start a bespoke hot-tub business together.  Follow their story for a short, <20 minute foray into their domestic lives - and play a fun minigame along the way!

Controls: Arrow keys to move, space moves your "bar" when in the minigame and E to interact/advance dialogue.

FAQ

Q) Help! I broke something/I'm stuck/What do I do?

A) Press E or space if you're stuck. If something genuinely breaks, restart the game.

Q) Misha?

A) He's a guy.

Q) The title?

A) They're two bros, chilling in a hot tub. You know the rest.
